xtce:SpaceSystem.name: BogusSAT
xtce:SpaceSystem.shortDescription: This is a bogus satellite telemetry and telecommand database.
xtce:SpaceSystem.xtce:LongDescription: This is a bogus satellite telemetry and telecommand database. The purpose of BogusSAT is to exercise the capabilities of XTCE and the XTCE View tool.

xtce:AuthorSet.xtce:Author: David Overeem, Member of the OMG SDTF and XTCE RTF

xtce:NoteSet.xtce:Note: The root SpaceSystem for BogusSAT contains the parameters needed to define the transport of data for any of the BogusSAT satellites in the fleet or constellation.

xtce:AbsoluteTimeParameterType.name: POSIXTimeType
xtce:AbsoluteTimeParameterType.shortDescription: POSIX UNIX Time 'timeval' which is 2 unsigned 32 bit integers

xtce:EnumeratedParameterType.name: MissionType
xtce:EnumeratedParameterType.shortDescription: Reserved Mission Phase and Operating Modes

xtce:IntegerParameterType.name: SomeParameter_Type
xtce:IntegerParameterType.shortDescription: Used to demonstrate going backwards in the parameterRef attribute

xtce:AggregateParameterType.name: CCSDS_Packet_Sequence_Type
xtce:AggregateParameterType.shortDescription: CCSDS Header Packet Sequence Control fields

xtce:IntegerParameterType.name: CCSDSVersionType
xtce:IntegerParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: By changing the version number, future variations of the telemetry source packet structure can be introduced. At present, however, only one version number shall be used: (value = 0).

xtce:BooleanParameterType.name: CCSDSTypeType
xtce:BooleanParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: This bit distinguishes between telecommand packets and telemetry source packets. For telemetry source packets, the type = 0.

xtce:BooleanParameterType.name: CCSDSSecHdrFlagType
xtce:BooleanParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: This indicates the presence or absence of a data field header. If using ECSS PUS, and with the exception of the spacecraft time source packet, all telemetry source packets shall have a data field header, for which this bit shall be set to 1.

xtce:IntegerParameterType.name: CCSDSAPIDType
xtce:IntegerParameterType.shortDescription: CCSDS Application Process ID, with 2047 being an IDLE fill packet

xtce:EnumeratedParameterType.name: CCSDSGroupFlagsType
xtce:EnumeratedParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: The grouping flags shall be used when a number of telemetry source packets originating from the same application process are sent in a group. The interpretation of the grouping flags shall be 1=first packet of a group of packets, 0=continuation packet, 2=last packet of a group of packets, 3="stand-alone" packet. If using ECSS PUS, All standard telemetry source packets defined are stand-alone packets.

xtce:IntegerParameterType.name: CCSDSSourceSequenceCountType
xtce:IntegerParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: A separate source sequence count shall be maintained by each APID and shall be incremented by 1 whenever it releases a packet. If the application process can send distinct packets to distinct destinations using the optional Destination ID field shown below, then a separate source sequence count is maintained for each destination. Therefore the counter corresponds to the order of release of packets by the source and enables the destination (e.g. the ground system) to detect missing packets. This counter should never re-initialize; however, under no circumstances shall it “shortcycle” (i.e. have a discontinuity other than to a value zero). The counter wraps around from max value to zero.

xtce:IntegerParameterType.name: CCSDSPacketLengthType
xtce:IntegerParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: The packet length field specifies the number of octets contained within the packet data field. The number shall be an unsigned integer “C” where C = (Number of octets in packet data field) minus 1. NOTE The actual length of the entire telemetry source packet, including the source packet header, is 6 octets longer.

xtce:IntegerParameterType.name: PUSspare1Type
xtce:IntegerParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: To maintain symmetry with the telecommand packet data field header, this bit shall be reserved and set to zero.

xtce:IntegerParameterType.name: PUSVersionType
xtce:IntegerParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: By changing the PUS version number, future variations of the telemetry source packet can be introduced. It is expected to introduce a new version in the future for telemetry source packets that contain more than one service data unit. Users of ECSS PUS shall use version 1

xtce:IntegerParameterType.name: PUSspare4Type
xtce:IntegerParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: Spare bits shall be introduced in order tomake up an integral octet. These spare bits shall be set to zero.

xtce:IntegerParameterType.name: PUSServiceType
xtce:IntegerParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: This indicates the service to which this telemetry source packet relates. Service types 0 to 127 shall be reserved for this Standard, service types 128 to 255 are mission-specific.

xtce:IntegerParameterType.name: PUSSubServiceType
xtce:IntegerParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: Together with the service type, the subtype uniquely identifies the nature of the service report constituted by this telemetry source packet. Within standard services, subtypes 0 to 127 shall be reserved for this Standard, subtypes 128 to 255 are mission-specific. Within mission-specific services, all subtypes (0 to 255) are available for mission-specific use.

xtce:IntegerParameterType.name: PUSSeqCountType
xtce:IntegerParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: This is a counter that increments each time the application process releases a newpacket of this type and subtype. If the application process can send distinct packets to distinct destinations using the optional Destination ID field shown below, then a separate source sequence count shall be maintained for each destination. Whilst the source sequence count enables the destination (e.g. the ground) to detect a transmission gap, this packet sub-counter givesmore information on the nature of the particular packets that are missing. This field shall be systematically omitted if this information is not applicable for this application process.

xtce:IntegerParameterType.name: PUSDestinationType
xtce:IntegerParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: This field identifies the destination of the telemetry source packet. The length of this field is known implicitly for the mission. This field shall be systematically omitted if the mission has only a single destination (i.e. the ground system) for telemetry source packets or has no requirement to distinguish between destinations.

xtce:AbsoluteTimeParameterType.name: PUSTimeType
xtce:AbsoluteTimeParameterType.shortDescription: OPTIONAL PUS Timestamp (CUC or CDS CCSDS Time Standard)
xtce:AbsoluteTimeParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: The on-board reference time of the packet, expressed in either the CUC or CDS format (as defined in CCSDS 301.0-B-2). The choice between CUC and CDS formats and the resolution of the timefield can vary from mission to mission and even between different application processes within the same satellite. For some missions or application processes, this time field may even not be present.The presence or absence of the field and its encoding are explicitly defined by the mission constant "APPL_TIME_CODE" of which there are asmany as there are on-board application processes. The representations of the timefield are those defined in clause 23 of thisStandard. If the CDS format is used, the standard CCSDS epoch of 1958 January 1 shall be applicable, see CCSDS 301.0-B-2. The packet on-board time corresponds to any well-defined time before the sampling of any data within the packet.

xtce:BinaryParameterType.name: PUSErrorControlFieldType
xtce:BinaryParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: The packet error control field transports an error detection code that can be used by the ground system to verify the integrity of the complete telemetry source packet. The presence of the PEC and its type (either a checksum or CRC) shall be fixed for the complete mission for each application process and defined by the mission constant "TM_CHECKSUM_TYPE".

xtce:IntegerParameterType.name: LittleEndianInteger1
xtce:IntegerParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: This parameter type is used to test the byteOrder attribute

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: LittleEndianFloat1
xtce:FloatParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: This parameter type is used to test the byteOrder attribute

xtce:Parameter.name: TM_CHECKSUM_TYPE
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: ECSS PUS Constant
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: This indicates the presence and (if present) the type of checksumused for checking the integrity of telemetry source packets for the given application process. The type shall be either an ISO standard checksum or a Cyclic Redundancy Check (CRC).

xtce:Parameter.name: APPL_TIME_CODE
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: ECSS PUS Constant
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: This mission constant identifies the presence or absence of the telemetry source packet time field as well as the time format (CUC or CDS) and the encoding of the time field. There is one such mission constant for each on-board application process.

xtce:Parameter.name: PUS_Structure_ID
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: The PUS Structure ID identifies a specific Housekeeping Parameter content in service (3,25)

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: CCSDSPacket
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: Super-container for all CCSDS telemetry and telecommand packets
xtce:SequenceContainer.xtce:LongDescription: Structure of this container is standardized. This representation was borrowed for the ECSS PUS Document E-70-41A, which restates the general CCSDS standard for the CCSDS header.

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: CCSDSTelemetryPacket
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: Super-container for all CCSDS telemetry packets
xtce:SequenceContainer.xtce:LongDescription: Restricted based on the two identifying values in the standard that are a general requirement for a telemetry packet.

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: CCSDSPUSTelemetryPacket
xtce:SequenceContainer.xtce:LongDescription: Super-container for all CCSDS/ECSS PUS telemetry packets.

xtce:MetaCommand.name: CCSDSTelecommand
xtce:MetaCommand.xtce:LongDescription: Base telecommand structure for all CCSDS based telecommands.

xtce:CommandContainer.name: CCSDSTelecommandPacket
xtce:CommandContainer.xtce:LongDescription: Super-container for all CCSDS telecommand packets.

xtce:MetaCommand.name: CCSDSPUSTelecommand
xtce:MetaCommand.xtce:LongDescription: Base telecommand structure for all CCSDS/ECSS PUS based telecommand packets.

xtce:MetaCommand.name: CCSDSDirectTelecommand
xtce:MetaCommand.xtce:LongDescription: Base telecommand structure for all CCSDS based hardware direct telecommand packets.

xtce:CommandContainer.name: CCSDSTelecommandPacket
xtce:CommandContainer.shortDescription: Super-container for all CCSDS telecommand packets
xtce:CommandContainer.xtce:LongDescription: Restricted based on the two identifying values in the standard that are a general requirement for a telemetry packet.

xtce:SpaceSystem.name: SC001
xtce:SpaceSystem.shortDescription: This is the first spacecraft in the BogusSAT system
xtce:SpaceSystem.xtce:LongDescription: This space system contains the telemetry packets that comprise TM parameters from the various subsystems on the satellite.

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: ECSS_Service_1_Subservice_2
xtce:SequenceContainer.xtce:LongDescription: Report of refused/failed acceptance of a telecommand packet. This example is based on the design presented in document ECSS-E-70-41A (30 Jan 2003).

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: ECSS_Service_3_Subservice_25
xtce:SequenceContainer.xtce:LongDescription: The service 3,25 packet of the ECSS PUS contains the housekeeping telemetry subpackets, switched with the PUS_Structure_ID parameter. This example is based on the design presented in document ECSS-E-70-41A (30 Jan 2003).

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: ECSS_Service_6_Subservice_6
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: Memory Dump using Absolute Addresses Report (6,6)
xtce:SequenceContainer.xtce:LongDescription: The packet defines the contents of a response to the telecommand "Dump Memory using Absolute Addresses (6,5)". This assumes that only 1 address+data can be dumped at a time. The length of the data is variable and the checksum for the data is used. This example is based on the design presented in document ECSS-E-70-41A (30 Jan 2003).

xtce:EnumeratedParameterType.name: TC_Accept_Failure_Code_Type
xtce:EnumeratedParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: The code indicates the reason for the failure of the telecommand at this verification stage.

xtce:Parameter.name: TC_Packet_ID
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: TC Packet Identifier
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: This is a copy of the corresponding fields from the packet header of the telecommand to which this verification packet relates.

xtce:Parameter.name: TC_Packet_Sequence_Control
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: TC Packet Sequence Number
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: This is a copy of the corresponding fields from the packet header of the telecommand to which this verification packet relates.

xtce:Parameter.name: TC_Accept_Failure_Code
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Acceptance Failure Reason

xtce:Parameter.name: TC_Parameter_Count
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: TC Packet Parameters (specific to the TC)

xtce:Parameter.name: TC_Parameter_Data
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Unrealistic repeating list of 32 bit parameter data

xtce:EnumeratedParameterType.name: Dump_Memory_ID_Type
xtce:EnumeratedParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: The names of the memory areas on the physical processor.

xtce:Parameter.name: Dump_Memory_ID
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Physical Memory Area Name

xtce:Parameter.name: Dump_Memory_Address
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Source address of the physical memory where the data block originates

xtce:Parameter.name: Dump_Memory_Length
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Length of the data being dumped in the data field

xtce:Parameter.name: Dump_Memory_Data
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: The binary data being dumped from the source address

xtce:Parameter.name: Dump_Memory_Chksum
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: ISO standard 16 bit checksum for the data block being dumped

xtce:SpaceSystem.name: Onboard_Tables
xtce:SpaceSystem.shortDescription: Tables of data onboard that are not part of the regular TM stream

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Float32_Offset
xtce:FloatParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: A long description for this type

xtce:Parameter.name: Battery_Voltage_Offset
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Correction for battery voltage measurements
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: Extended discussion about the nature of the battery voltage offset

xtce:Parameter.name: Solar_Array_Voltage_1_Offset
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Correction for solar array voltage measurements

xtce:Parameter.name: Solar_Array_Voltage_2_Offset
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Correction for solar array voltage measurements

xtce:Parameter.name: Battery_Current_Offset
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Correction for battery current measurements

xtce:Parameter.name: Default_CPU_Start_Mode
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Starting mode for the onboard processor

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: Calibration_Offsets
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: This is an onboard table for upload/download that contains configuration parameters

xtce:VariableFrameStream.name: CALTABLE
xtce:VariableFrameStream.shortDescription: This is an onboard table for upload/download that contains configuration parameters

xtce:SpaceSystem.name: Onboard_Processor_Config
xtce:SpaceSystem.shortDescription: This is the onboard processor configuration parameters uploaded and/or downloaded as binary data for reconfiguration

xtce:EnumeratedParameterType.name: Table_Processor_ID_Type
xtce:EnumeratedParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: The processor ID value of the table is not used by the onboard processor except at transfer time for data assurance and as such is not a part of the memory image onboard.

xtce:BinaryParameterType.name: Table_CRC_Value_Type
xtce:BinaryParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: The CRC value of the table is not used by the onboard processor except at transfer time for data assurance and as such is not a part of the memory image onboard.

xtce:Member.name: COREINF
xtce:Member.shortDescription: Log level for Common Infrastructure Software

xtce:Member.name: ANTCTRL
xtce:Member.shortDescription: Log level for Payload Antenna Control Software

xtce:Member.name: TCMGMNT
xtce:Member.shortDescription: Log level for Telecommand Management Software

xtce:Member.name: TIME
xtce:Member.shortDescription: Log level for Time Keeping Software

xtce:Member.name: TMMGMNT
xtce:Member.shortDescription: Log level for Telemetry Management Software

xtce:Member.name: INTERFACE
xtce:Member.shortDescription: Log level for Bus and Payload Hardware Interface Software

xtce:Member.name: MW1553
xtce:Member.shortDescription: Log level for 1553 Communications Interface Software

xtce:AggregateParameterType.name: Config_PROM_Access_Type
xtce:AggregateParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: PROM programming and access timing constraints

xtce:Enumeration.label: DISABLED
xtce:Enumeration.shortDescription: Built-In Self Test not to execute on boot

xtce:Enumeration.label: ENABLED
xtce:Enumeration.shortDescription: Built-In Self Test execute on boot

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Power_Level_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: This demonstrates using a ContextCalibrator so that the engineering conversion is different for each of the two processors.

xtce:DefaultCalibrator.name: Default_Counts
xtce:DefaultCalibrator.shortDescription: This calibrator is used for PROCESSOR3

xtce:Parameter.name: Table_Processor_ID
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Identifier for the onboard processor associated with the configuration table

xtce:Parameter.name: Table_CRC_Value
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: CRC value of the configuration table for data assurance

xtce:Parameter.name: Config_Self_Test
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Built-In Self Test Processor Restart Configuration Flags

xtce:Parameter.name: Config_Clock_ID
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Onboard Clock to Synchronize with on Reset

xtce:Parameter.name: Config_Ant_Power_Level
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Default transmit power level setting
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: The power level setting is calibrated differently for the three on-board processors. This is due to a slight hardware difference between the 1, 2, and 3 units.

xtce:Parameter.name: Config_Payload_IF_ID
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: The payload interface ID to use
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: The payload interface is only available to processor 1. The backup processor cannot do payload functions.

xtce:Parameter.name: Config_Payload_Perf
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: The payload performance mode to use
xtce:Parameter.xtce:LongDescription: The payload interface is only available to processor 1. The backup processor cannot do payload functions.

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: Processor_Config_Table
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: This is the onboard processor configuration table container layout for encoding and decoding parameters

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: Processor_1_Config_Table
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: This is the onboard processor 1 specific configuration table container layout for encoding and decoding parameters

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: Processor_2_Config_Table
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: This is the onboard processor 2 specific configuration table container layout for encoding and decoding parameters

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: Processor_3_Config_Table
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: This is the onboard processor 3 specific configuration table container layout for encoding and decoding parameters

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: Dummy_24bit_Container
xtce:SequenceContainer.xtce:LongDescription: This is NOT a recommended practice. This container exists to verify in the unit tests that this will work, albeit not the best idea. There might be some corner cases in a database design where something like this is actually needed, so it is supported as a possibility.

xtce:VariableFrameStream.name: CFGTABLE
xtce:VariableFrameStream.shortDescription: This is the onboard processor configuration table binary file stream

xtce:BooleanParameterType.name: Battery_Charge_Mode_Type
xtce:BooleanParameterType.shortDescription: This parameter indicates whether the charger is charging the battery

xtce:BooleanParameterType.name: boolean_float32_Type
xtce:BooleanParameterType.shortDescription: Generic boolean EU type with float32 data encoding

xtce:BooleanParameterType.name: boolean_float64_Type
xtce:BooleanParameterType.shortDescription: Generic boolean EU type with float64 data encoding

xtce:BooleanParameterType.name: boolean_binary_Type
xtce:BooleanParameterType.shortDescription: Generic boolean EU type with binary data encoding

xtce:BooleanParameterType.name: boolean_string_Type
xtce:BooleanParameterType.shortDescription: Generic boolean EU type with string data encoding

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Battery_Voltage_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This parameter describes the measured battery voltage
xtce:FloatParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: The battery on BogusSAT is a modeled by a typical flooded lead acid car battery.

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Battery_Current_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This parameter describes the measured current draw
xtce:FloatParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: The battery on BogusSAT is a modeled by a typical flooded lead acid car battery.

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Solar_Array_Voltage_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This parameter describes the measured solar array output voltage at the charger
xtce:FloatParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: The solar array on BogusSAT is 10 230W Trina TSM-DA05 monocrystalline panels, wired in series.

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Quadratic_Demo_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is an analog parameter with a simple quadratic encoding

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Quadratic_Demo_SingleRoot_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with a float quadratic encoding

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Quadratic_Demo_SingleRoot2_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with a float quadratic encoding

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Spline_Demo_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with a float spline encoding

xtce:BooleanParameterType.name: Solar_Array_Voltage_State_Type
xtce:BooleanParameterType.shortDescription: The operational state of the solar array voltage sensor

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Float_MathOpCal_1_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with a simple math operation calibrator

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Float_MathOpCal_2_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is a float parameter with a longer math operation calibrator

xtce:Parameter.name: SensorTime
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Measurement time of the sensor data

xtce:Parameter.name: SunSensorMode
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Operational mode of the sun sensor

xtce:Parameter.name: EarthSensorMode
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Operational mode of the earth sensor

xtce:Parameter.name: SunSensorLevel
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Illumination level measurement of the sun sensor

xtce:Parameter.name: EarthSensorLevel
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Illumination level of the earth sensor

xtce:Parameter.name: Float_MathOpCal_3
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Ohms to Celcius Calibrator

xtce:MathAlgorithm.name: ComputeBatterySOC
xtce:MathAlgorithm.shortDescription: Compute the battery state of charge

xtce:IntegerArgumentType.name: RW_UNIT_ID_Type
xtce:IntegerArgumentType.shortDescription: ID number of the reaction wheel

xtce:EnumeratedArgumentType.name: RW_PWR_STATE_Type
xtce:EnumeratedArgumentType.shortDescription: Flag to indicate if power should be turned on or off

xtce:MetaCommand.name: Reaction_Wheel_Control
xtce:MetaCommand.xtce:LongDescription: This hardware telecommand directs the hardware to power on or off either of the 2 reaction wheels

xtce:MetaCommand.name: Reaction_Wheel_1_On
xtce:MetaCommand.shortDescription: Turn power on for reaction wheel 1
xtce:MetaCommand.xtce:LongDescription: This hardware telecommand is a derived form of 'Reaction_Wheel_Control' that turns ON reaction wheel 1

xtce:MetaCommand.name: Reaction_Wheel_1_Off
xtce:MetaCommand.shortDescription: Turn power off for reaction wheel 1
xtce:MetaCommand.xtce:LongDescription: This hardware telecommand is a derived form of 'Reaction_Wheel_Control' that turns OFF reaction wheel 1

xtce:MetaCommand.name: Reaction_Wheel_2_On
xtce:MetaCommand.shortDescription: Turn power on for reaction wheel 2
xtce:MetaCommand.xtce:LongDescription: This hardware telecommand is a derived form of 'Reaction_Wheel_Control' that turns ON reaction wheel 2

xtce:MetaCommand.name: Reaction_Wheel_2_Off
xtce:MetaCommand.shortDescription: Turn power off for reaction wheel 2
xtce:MetaCommand.xtce:LongDescription: This hardware telecommand is a derived form of 'Reaction_Wheel_Control' that turns OFF reaction wheel 2

xtce:MetaCommand.name: Set_Mission_Phase
xtce:MetaCommand.shortDescription: Set the bus electronics mission phase

xtce:SpaceSystem.name: Payload1
xtce:SpaceSystem.xtce:LongDescription: This is the primary revenue generating payload software monitor and control data.

xtce:EnumeratedParameterType.name: enum_int16_signmag_Type
xtce:EnumeratedParameterType.shortDescription: Generic EU Enumerated type with raw int16 signMagnitude encoding

xtce:EnumeratedParameterType.name: enum_int16_twoscomp_Type
xtce:EnumeratedParameterType.shortDescription: Generic EU Enumerated type with raw int16 twosComplement encoding

xtce:EnumeratedParameterType.name: enum_int16_onescomp_Type
xtce:EnumeratedParameterType.shortDescription: Generic EU Enumerated type with raw int16 onesComplement encoding

xtce:EnumeratedParameterType.name: enum_binary_Type
xtce:EnumeratedParameterType.shortDescription: Generic EU Enumerated type with raw binary encoding

xtce:EnumeratedParameterType.name: enum_float32_Type
xtce:EnumeratedParameterType.shortDescription: Generic EU Enumerated type with raw float32 encoding

xtce:EnumeratedParameterType.name: enum_float64_Type
xtce:EnumeratedParameterType.shortDescription: Generic EU Enumerated type with raw float64 encoding

xtce:EnumeratedParameterType.name: enum_string_Type
xtce:EnumeratedParameterType.shortDescription: Generic EU Enumerated type with raw string encoding

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Basic_Float32_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is an float32 parameter with a simple float32 encoding

xtce:FloatParameterType.name: Basic_Float64_Type
xtce:FloatParameterType.shortDescription: This is an float64 parameter with a simple float64 encoding

xtce:IntegerParameterType.name: Basic_int32_signmag_Type
xtce:IntegerParameterType.shortDescription: Generic signed 32 bit number with sign magnitude encoding

xtce:IntegerParameterType.name: Basic_int32_twoscomp_Type
xtce:IntegerParameterType.shortDescription: Generic signed 32 bit number with twos complement encoding

xtce:IntegerParameterType.name: Basic_int32_onescomp_Type
xtce:IntegerParameterType.shortDescription: Generic signed 32 bit number with ones complement encoding

xtce:StringParameterType.name: Basic_string_binary_Type
xtce:StringParameterType.shortDescription: Generic string encoded as binary octets instead of C style char string encoding

xtce:ArrayParameterType.name: Array_Dim1_Float64_Type
xtce:ArrayParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: This is some calibration values for a payload device

xtce:ArrayParameterType.name: Array_Dim1_Float32_Type
xtce:ArrayParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: This is some more calibration values for a payload device

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: IncludedContainer1
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: Unit Test of container to include

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: IncludedContainer2
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: Unit Test of container to include

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: IncludedContainer3
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: Unit Test of conditionally included container with conditionally included parameter

xtce:IntegerArgumentType.name: Value32_Type
xtce:IntegerArgumentType.shortDescription: New value to set to 32 bit integer item

xtce:MetaCommand.name: Payload_1_Control
xtce:MetaCommand.shortDescription: Controls the state of payload operation

xtce:Argument.name: OUTPUT_POWER
xtce:Argument.xtce:LongDescription: Long Description of the output power argument

xtce:MetaCommand.name: Adjust_Payload_1_Config
xtce:MetaCommand.xtce:LongDescription: Modifies an internal configurable item at a provided address for the payload processor

xtce:SpaceSystem.name: LOG_MSGS
xtce:SpaceSystem.xtce:LongDescription: Example of variable length log messages from a satellite

xtce:AbsoluteTimeParameterType.name: POSIXTime_Type
xtce:AbsoluteTimeParameterType.shortDescription: POSIX UNIX Time 'timeval' which is 2 unsigned 32 bit integers

xtce:Enumeration.label: ERROR_CODE_A
xtce:Enumeration.shortDescription: Detailed description of error case A

xtce:Enumeration.label: ERROR_CODE_B
xtce:Enumeration.shortDescription: Detailed description of error case B

xtce:Enumeration.label: ERROR_CODE_C
xtce:Enumeration.shortDescription: Detailed description of error case C

xtce:Enumeration.label: ERROR_CODE_D
xtce:Enumeration.shortDescription: Detailed description of error case D

xtce:Enumeration.label: ERROR_CODE_E
xtce:Enumeration.shortDescription: Detailed description of error case E

xtce:Parameter.name: RECORDFLAG
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Record Marker

xtce:Parameter.name: LOGLEVEL
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Log entry severity level

xtce:Parameter.name: FACILITY
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Subsystem or facility flag

xtce:Parameter.name: ERRORCODE
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Error code enumeration

xtce:Parameter.name: DATAWORDS
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Number of words of supplementary data for the error code

xtce:Parameter.name: LOGTIME
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Time of log record

xtce:Parameter.name: DYNAMIC_REGION_1
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Dynamic binary data space

xtce:Parameter.name: DYNAMIC_REGION_2
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Dynamic binary data space

xtce:Parameter.name: WRAP_FLAG
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Rolling wrap around has occurred

xtce:Parameter.name: START_POINTER
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Current starting pointer at lowest time entry

xtce:Parameter.name: END_POINTER
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Current ending pointer at lowest time entry

xtce:Parameter.name: SIZE_USED
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: Number of words used
